turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Google, can you place coffee order for pickup?I will pick up on the way

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Where would like to place an order- Starbucks or Pete

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. From your history, I see that you mostly prefer Motcha or cappuccino varieties. So what would like to have?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will go with Motcha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. I see Berry Motcha and Caramel Motcha top the menu list based on user feedback. Wich would you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm..Let me try Berry Motcha this time

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What quantity do you want? Small medium or tall

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium should be fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What type of milk would you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will go with skimmed milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.Would you wand to add any other add-ons like cream, sugar, Honey?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Extra whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Let me go ahead and place the order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you say you would pickup your drink? At which location would you want to pickup your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. At the one which is at the intersection of Dundee and McHenry road

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.Thanks. I see that you have setup your payment information. Let me place the order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order has been placed and the estimated time for it to be ready 10mins..

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok cool

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order details have been texted to your phone.Is there anything I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No..thanks.i am good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.
